targets.expr:
avg_over_time(
  (
    sum without() (up{instance="https://hr-ideascape.app.corpintra.net/structurecube/#/", job="blackbox"})
      or
    (0 * sum_over_time(up{instance="https://hr-ideascape.app.corpintra.net/structurecube/#/", job="blackbox"}[$__interval]))
  )[1h:$__interval]
)*100

targets.expr:
avg_over_time(
  (
    sum without() (up{instance="https://hr-ideascape.app.corpintra.net/structurecube/#/", job="blackbox"})
      or
